com.jlreyes.libraries.android_game_engine.sprites.textures

Class Texture.TexturePart

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jlreyes.libraries.android_game_engine.sprites.textures.Texture.TexturePart
  • Enclosing class:
    Texture

    public static class Texture.TexturePart
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a part of a larger texture. Is a row x col matrix where each index is of type Frame.
    Author:
    jlreyes

      Frees up resources by calling glDeleteTextures on our handles
      void updateVertices(Renderable.RenderType renderType, int numVertices)
